description: 3 online quizzes testing understanding of previous weeks' materials, with highest grade from three attempts. Covers definitions, formulae, and problem-solving methods.
2.5-hour final examination assessing knowledge from Weeks 1-10 through multiple-choice and short-answer questions. Tests definitions, formulae derivation, ray diagrams, and problem-solving.
Weekly group lab reports involving measurements, calculations, and critical questions about experiments. Focuses on observation skills and understanding of lab principles.
Moodle-based exam covering Weeks 1-3 content with MCQ and short-answer questions. Assesses definitions, ray tracing, and problem-solving skills.
